page.title: 20TRADE
page.content: {SHOPS, BUSINESSES, GROWTH. { {SHOPS :}THERE ARE THREE SHOPPING CENTRES IN OUR BLOCK, THE LARGEST BEING THE KINGDOM CENTRE, WHERE SHOPS RANGE FROM SMALL GROCERS TO LARGE CHAIN STORES. THERE ARE ALSO SEVEN CORNER SHOPS SCATTERED THROUGHOUT THE AREA. {BUSINESSES :}THESE INCLUDE BANKS(THE FOUR MAJOR SCOTTISH BANKS), THE LARGER BUILDING SOCIETIES,INSURANCE BROKERS AND TRAVEL AGENTS.{ {GROWTH :}AS THE POPULATION GROWS (1960/12,500:1970/27000:1980/38000) SO SHOPS AND BUSINESSES HAVE GROWN IN NUMBER, WITH THE AREA OCCUPIED BY COMMERCIAL PREMISES INCREASING FROM 4000 SQ.METRES IN 1960 TO OVER 50000 SQ. METRES AT PRESENT.
